= Introduction =

This is the Arduino to XMC microcontroller porting project Wiki.


= Details =

This project has the aim to:
  * port the intuitive Arduino Wiring Language to XMC microcontrollers;
  * create the Arduino/hardware/xmc/cores/ library;
  * port the exising Arduino tutorials (http://arduino.cc/en/Tutorial/HomePage) examples code.
